name: raspberry-image-resizer-docker
description: Cross-platform Raspberry Pi image resizing and SD card cloning tool with Bun + TypeScript

scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:e2e
scripts.build: bun run build:worker && bun run build:test-helper && bun run build:cli
scripts.docker:build: bun run build:worker && bun run build:test-helper && docker build -t rpi-image-resizer:latest .
